method.name: add_collision_polygon
method.description: Adds a collision polygon to the tile on the given TileSet physics layer.

method.name: get_collision_polygon_one_way_margin
method.description: Returns the one-way margin (for one-way platforms) of the polygon at index [code]polygon_index[/code] for TileSet physics layer with index [code]layer_id[/code].

method.name: get_collision_polygon_points
method.description: Returns the points of the polygon at index [code]polygon_index[/code] for TileSet physics layer with index [code]layer_id[/code].

method.name: get_collision_polygons_count
method.description: Returns how many polygons the tile has for TileSet physics layer with index [code]layer_id[/code].

method.name: get_constant_angular_velocity
method.description: Returns the constant angular velocity applied to objects colliding with this tile.

method.name: get_constant_linear_velocity
method.description: Returns the constant linear velocity applied to objects colliding with this tile.

method.name: get_custom_data
method.description: Returns the custom data value for custom data layer named [code]layer_name[/code].

method.name: get_custom_data_by_layer_id
method.description: Returns the custom data value for custom data layer with index [code]layer_id[/code].

method.name: get_navigation_polygon
method.description: Returns the navigation polygon of the tile for the TileSet navigation layer with index [code]layer_id[/code].

method.name: get_occluder
method.description: Returns the occluder polygon of the tile for the TileSet occlusion layer with index [code]layer_id[/code].

method.name: get_peering_bit_terrain
method.description: Returns the tile's terrain bit for the given [code]peering_bit[/code] direction.

method.name: is_collision_polygon_one_way
method.description: Returns whether one-way collisions are enabled for the polygon at index [code]polygon_index[/code] for TileSet physics layer with index [code]layer_id[/code].

method.name: remove_collision_polygon
method.description: Removes the polygon at index [code]polygon_index[/code] for TileSet physics layer with index [code]layer_id[/code].

method.name: set_collision_polygon_one_way
method.description: Enables/disables one-way collisions on the polygon at index [code]polygon_index[/code] for TileSet physics layer with index [code]layer_id[/code].

method.name: set_collision_polygon_one_way_margin
method.description: Enables/disables one-way collisions on the polygon at index [code]polygon_index[/code] for TileSet physics layer with index [code]layer_id[/code].

method.name: set_collision_polygon_points
method.description: Sets the points of the polygon at index [code]polygon_index[/code] for TileSet physics layer with index [code]layer_id[/code].

method.name: set_collision_polygons_count
method.description: Sets the polygons count for TileSet physics layer with index [code]layer_id[/code].

method.name: set_constant_angular_velocity
method.description: Sets the constant angular velocity. This does not rotate the tile. This angular velocity is applied to objects colliding with this tile.

method.name: set_constant_linear_velocity
method.description: Sets the constant linear velocity. This does not move the tile. This linear velocity is applied to objects colliding with this tile. This is useful to create conveyor belts.

method.name: set_custom_data
method.description: Sets the tile's custom data value for the TileSet custom data layer with name [code]layer_name[/code].

method.name: set_custom_data_by_layer_id
method.description: Sets the tile's custom data value for the TileSet custom data layer with index [code]layer_id[/code].

method.name: set_navigation_polygon
method.description: Sets the navigation polygon for the TileSet navigation layer with index [code]layer_id[/code].

method.name: set_occluder
method.description: Sets the occluder for the TileSet occlusion layer with index [code]layer_id[/code].

method.name: set_peering_bit_terrain
method.description: Sets the tile's terrain bit for the given [code]peering_bit[/code] direction.
